tp:docstring.p: Interface for obtaining well known handles for emergency services and their aliases.
The emergency services are identified using a 'urn:service:sos' service urn, specified by RFC 5031. The aliases are used to identify the emergency service locally, e.g., "112", "911" or "999".

method.name: GetEmergencyServices

tp:docstring.p: Return the service urns, corresponding to the emergency contacts, e.g., "urn:service:sos", a contact handle corresponding to it, and the list of local aliases identifying the emergency service, e.g., "911" or "112".

method.tp:docstring: Obtain the available emergency service URNs and the local aliases identifying them.

signal.name: EmergencyServicesChanged

tp:docstring.p: List the service urns, corresponding to the emergency contacts, e.g., "urn:service:sos", a contact handle corresponding to it, and the list of local aliases identifying the emergency service, e.g., "911" or "112".

signal.tp:docstring: Indicate that the available emergency service URNs and the local aliases identifying them have been changed.
